review: I found her approach totally different from other doctors from whom I got treatment before, who keep the patient in dilemma and panic which ultimately push them to make rounds of visits to the doctors. Dr. Anukriti's first approach is to develop a belief in the patient that the disease is curable and this belief makes the patient half cured. She discusses all about the disease and its root cause with the patient in a friendly manner and advice only those medicines which are required to treat and remove the root cause.
reply_text: Thank you. This means a lot to me. This will motivate me to do a lot better

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She beautifully explained the need for health screening. I got my own papsmear test done at the age of 52 for the first time. I was advised hysterectomy for vaginal discharge elsewhere. She explained that I don't need hysterectomy for vaginal discharge. Thanks to her that I narrowly escaped unnecessary surgery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My wife has very bad obstetric history with 3 mid trimester miscarriages. We had lost hope. We visited dr Anukriti because one of my recommended her as he was very satisfied with his wife's treatment. She explained the reason behind the miscarriages and what needs to be done. We remained in her follow up throo the pregnancy and now we are a proud parent of a beautiful girl. Thank you dr Anukriti.

Dr. Anukriti is a very senior and experienced doctor.  She makes the patient believe that the disease is curable. Being a lady she understands all the problems faced by a woman. I was not aware of the root cause of my critical gynecological problem and was in panic untill she explained about it and I got relaxed. She discusses all about the disease and its root cause with the patient in a friendly manner.  She advice very few medicines.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind and encouraging words

review:
My father had taught science to Dr. Anukriti in school. And 
now after many years,  in the tough covid times, she had treated my father with personal attention and regular feedbacks. Not only she did a good job as a doctor but also payed tribute to her teacher as a student also.
reply_text: I did my duty. Thank you

review: Great doctor, *** *** *** *** **** **** ** ******* we were trying to conceive from last approx one year but it was not working. We visited Dr and result was unbelievable my wife conceive within three months after Consultation. I am glad to say that recently blessed with a baby girl. Dr is professional and always in a good mood while Consulting i suggest any couple having any issue.I would recommend everyone to consult this doctor..

*** ** *** **** *** * **** **** *** **** *** *********** ********* ********* She is so calm and relaxed and really have a healing capacity,she make sure that all the standard procedures should be implemented at her best. Love to recommend ❤️❤️
reply_text: Thank you. Such reviews motivates me further to the patient care. Patient care is of utmost importance

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor Anukriti was so patient to hear my issue and resolved it by prescribing the right medicine. I'm more than happy in consulting the doctor. I would definitely recommend the doctor to my friends.

I had never seen such a brilliant,experienced,caring & friendly doctor in my life!  She is an excellent doctor, dedicated towards her profession and always cares her patients & loved ones. She is not only excellent doctor, she is simple, superb human being, sober, approachable, friendly approach with smiling face with her selfless service. She supports their patients & loved ones when and where they are needed. She works with a missionary zeal and sacrifices her comforts to the service of mankind. Even at odd hours, she always ready to attend those who needs her advice & treatment. 
Hardly find such a wonderful doctor in this era.Last week,i was suffered by severe drug allergy and as she treated me, I never ever forget and i want to thank her from bottom of my heart. 
May God bless her and best wishes for the future! 

Patient name:-Priyadarshani Singh

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: I am very thankful to dr anukriti for our infertility treatment. We were having a very hard time in conceiving. We didn't want IVF. With her treatment my wife conceived with very minimal medicines and investigations. We are really grateful to her. Currently we are showing to her for the pregnancy follow up also.

I found her approach totally different from other doctors from whom I got treatment before, who keep the patient in dilemma and panic which ultimately push them to make rounds of visits to the doctors. Dr. Anukriti's first approach is to develop a belief in the patient that the disease is curable and this belief makes the patient half cured. She discusses all about the disease and its root cause with the patient in a friendly manner and advice only those medicines which are required to treat and remove the root cause.
